data.heading: The Earth in space
Say whether the statement is true or false.
Use the pin to burst the balloon with the correct answer.
Remember you have only 10 seconds to answer each question.
data.text: There are nine planets in the solar system.
The Earth is surrounded by the atmosphere.
The Sun is the biggest planet.
The Earth takes 24 hours to move around the Sun once.
The Moon is the only natural satellite of the Earth.
The spinning of the Earth causes day and night.
The Sun is the closest heavenly body to the Earth.
Looking at the Sun directly can damage our eyes.
The image shows the correct position of the Earth, the Sun, and the Moon.
The Moon has no light of its own.
data.feedback: Oh no! That is not correct.
